settings.title: David D. - CMC Motorsports
settings.p: "We hired Sauce Studios to launch our company's online marketing & website. Roy did an awesome job developing a strategy that worked for us. He was very professional and knowledgeable. Best of all he educated us every step of the way."

settings.title: Austin M. - Kaadenze Music
settings.p: "I am a music artist from Orange County, and Roy has exceeded all my expectations and has truly brought to life my vision through my new website!!!! He was very fun to work with on a creative/ professional side. He took the time and effort to make sure i was happy as well as be precise in his own knowledge to make sure he provided his top-tier product. DEFINITELY RECOMMEND ROY FOR YOUR WEBSITE NEEDS! I appreciate you Roy and look forward to the times ahead as we continue to work together!"

settings.title: Jessica B. - Iron Gritt
settings.p: "We've been working with Roy for over a year now and highly recommend him. Roy has built our website from the ground up, and he is also working on current projects."

settings.title: Chris C. - Costello Training
settings.p: "First off, super cool dude. Roy helped me out by talking through personalizing a site for my coaching and personal training business. It was a very helpful tech consultation. Very professional, very creative, and works well with you and your needs. Highly recommend."
